21-d-12-07-86-RFP.Primary Accident Cause: Other train operation/human factors (Provide detailed description in narrative)
21-d-12-07-86-RFP.Accident Cause: Other train operation/human factors (Provide detailed description in narrative)
21-d-12-07-86-RFP.Narrative: THE NORTHBOUND HUMP WAS INVOLVED IN THIS PARTICULAR INSTANCE IS EQUIPMENT WITH A PROCESS CONTROL HUMP COMPUTER.FOR HUMPING A TRAIN,THE HUMP COMPUTER MUST BE PLACED IN THE HUMP MODE BY THE HUMP CONDUCTOR AND WHEN TRIMMING OR WORKING FROM THE HUMP INTO AND OUT OF THE CLASSIFICATION YARD THROUGH THE RETARDER PERFORMING SWITCHING OTHER THAN HUMPING,THE COMPUTER SYSTEM MUST BE PLACED IN THE TRIM MODE.IN THE TRIM MODE,THE RETARDERS ARE LEFT IN THE NON-RETARDER POSITION AND THERE IS NO AUTOMATIC ROUTING OF CARS INTO THE CLASSIFICATION YD.IN THIS CASE,WHEN HUMP CONDUCTOR BROUGHT TRAIN TO HUMP,WHICH CONTAINED THE SOU 17828 CAR INVOLVED (1ST CAR IN TRAIN) HE FAILED TO PLACE THE HUMP COMPUTER IN THE HUMPING MODE,BUT RATHER LEFT SYSTEM IN THE TRIM MODE,WITH RESULTS THE SOUTHERN CAR 1728 MOVED OFF THEHUMP INTO NO.1 TRACK IN THE CLASSIFICATION YD,AGAINST THE SOUTHERN CABIN CAR X-613,WITHOUT ANY CONTROLLED RETARDATION OR ROUTE SELECTION PROTECTION.LOADED SOUTHERN CAR EXITED THE 1-8 GROUP RETARDER AND ENTERED NO.1 TRACK AT A VERY HIGH RATE OF SPEED (EST 12 MPH) AND UPON IMPACTING WITH SOUTHERN CABIN CAR DAMAGED.NoneNoneNone
